text: David E. Newman is a professor in the physics department at the University of Alaska Fairbanks. He has a Ph.D. in plasma physics and conducts research on transport dynamics in fusion energy using numerical and complex systems models.http://ffden-2.phys.uaf.edu/tacs.html ==References== Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:University of Alaska Fairbanks faculty Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American nuclear physicists
title: David Newman (physicist)
